item.description:
Ease your mind
Calm your body
Increase your creativity
And sense of well being...

Drop in relaxation session (indoors)

This week's topic: Breathing and Gentle Stretching Techniques.


We are meeting at Together in Motion (Thank you Kathleen for suggesting it!). I am trying this new location during the month of August. I hope the time and place will be convenient for everyone. Please follow this link for driving directions:
http://www.togetherin...
There's free parking available.

The studio is also accessible by public transportation. The closest subway station is Davis Square (red line). From there you can walk or take a bus (bus 87).

Hope to see you then!
item.how_to_find_us: Please go to the back of the building, you will see doors with the meetup sign on them. Go in and up the stairs to the waiting area.
item.name: Stress Reduction and Relaxation: Breathing and Gentle Stretching Techniques
